## Uploading libraries

```{r}
library("tidyverse")
library("here")
```

## Loading files

In this project we are working with three files: One with the counts data, one with clinical data, and one that maps the gene IDs to the Ensembl IDs.

Count data:

```{r}
count_data = read_tsv(here("_raw/TCGA-LUAD.star_counts.tsv.gz"))
```

Clinical data:

```{r}
clinical_data = read_tsv(here("_raw/TCGA-LUAD.clinical.tsv.gz"))
```

Mapping of Ensembl and gene ids:

```{r}
ensemble_to_gene_symbol = read_tsv(here("_raw/gencode.v36.annotation.gtf.gene.probemap"))
```

## Save the files into separate tsv files in the data folder

```{r}
dir.create(here("data"))
```

```{r}
write_tsv(count_data, 
          here("data/01_count_data_load.tsv"))
```

```{r}
write_tsv(clinical_data, 
          here("data/01_clinical_data_load.tsv"))
```

```{r}
write_tsv(ensemble_to_gene_symbol, 
          here("data/01_ensemble_to_gene_symbol_load.tsv"))
```
